verses.name: Isaiah 22:5
verses.text: For it is a day of trouble, and of treading down, and of perplexity by the Lord God of hosts in the valley of vision, breaking down the walls, and of crying to the mountains.

verses.name: Isaiah 22:6
verses.text: And Elam bare the quiver with chariots of men and horsemen, and Kir uncovered the shield.

verses.name: Isaiah 22:7
verses.text: And it shall come to pass, that thy choicest valleys shall be full of chariots, and the horsemen shall set themselves in array at the gate.

verses.name: Isaiah 22:8
verses.text: And he discovered the covering of Judah, and thou didst look in that day to the armour of the house of the forest.
